title: lost all msg's in inbox
content:
hi all

have somehow got an imap and a pop3 [version of the same acct] acct on my main pc , but they are are the same TB acct if that makes sense. suddenly ive lost all msg's in inbox.

have opened Tb in troublshoot mode but no help. i also did an "impoort" which was no help 

i have 2 inboxs with associated folders [which i don't want]. i was tackleling a problem with this acct in another thread and appreciate peoples input there, but it was not completely resolved

i suspect i need to change both accts to either pop2 or imap , preferably the one where data is kept on a server so acct is syced with my laptop pc

any help much appreciated. thanx

update: just now i did a second "Import", this was successful and recoverd my inbox msg's, but id still like some help getting back to normal, thanks
creator: stinkydog

title: Thunderbird en Edge? Ik gebruik Firefox.
content:
Hallo,

Bij het opstarten van Thunderbird verschijnt soms de mededeling in de bijlage. Waar komt die opmerking Edge: Too Many Requests vandaan en wat moet ik ermee?

Ik gebruik alleen Firefox.
creator: AKostenzer

title: Cannot log in to aol email account on Windows 11
content: I am trying to transition from Windows 10 to 11 but cannot log in to my AOL email account on the Windows 11 device. A message comes back "Edge: Too many requests". Presumably this refers to Windows Edge? although I have set Firefox as the default browser. I have set up my Gmail account without problem and the AOL configuration is correct. I can log in OK if I visit the AOL webpage and also still log in from the Windows 10 device. Any help would be gratefully received.
creator: bernardmabon

title: Atualização Thunderbird 140.4.0esr
content: Hoje o Thunderbird 140.4.0esr instalado no meu notebook foi atualizado e o resultado foi a DESTRUIÇÃO de todas as minhas contas de email e as pastas. Não há como desfazer a instalação da atualização. Péssimo.
creator: js.araujo
